author: Special Correspondent
text:
Unidentified persons snatched 10 sovereigns of gold from a woman, R. Jayasundari (58), near her house at Meenakshi Nagar near Narayanapuram tank on Wednesday afternoon.

The police said that the woman was returning home on foot when two persons, riding on a motorbike, yanked the gold chain and fled from the scene around 1.30 p.m.

The Tallakulam police are on the lookout for the accused.
title: Chain snatched
